EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Initial Iron Smelting Area at (0.0, 0.0)
Consists of two stone furnaces used for initial iron plate production:
- First furnace at (0.0, 0.0)
- Second furnace at (2.0, 0.0)

### Automated Iron Mining & Smelting System 1 at (-18.0, -49.0)
Complete mining and smelting setup consisting of:
- Burner mining drill at (-18.0, -49.0)
- Stone furnace at (-17.0, -47.0) positioned at drill's drop position
- Burner inserter at (-15.5, -46.5) to extract plates from furnace
- Wooden chest at (-14.5, -46.5) to collect iron plates

### Automated Iron Mining & Smelting System 2 at (-15.0, -50.0)
Complete mining and smelting setup consisting of:
- Burner mining drill at (-15.0, -50.0)
- Stone furnace at (-14.0, -48.0) positioned at drill's drop position
- Burner inserter at (-12.5, -47.5) to extract plates from furnace
- Wooden chest at (-11.5, -47.5) to collect iron plates

ERROR TIPS

### Errors with Crafting Requirements
- Ensure all prerequisite items are craftable before attempting to craft complex items
- When crafting items requiring smelted materials, set up smelting operations first

### Errors with Entity Placement
- Place furnaces exactly at mining drill's drop position to ensure ore collection
- Verify entity existence at a position before attempting to pick it up
- Ensure required items are in inventory before attempting to place entities

### Errors with Resource Management
- Keep track of fuel (coal) levels and ensure sufficient quantity before inserting into entities
- Maintain adequate inventory of required items before starting construction of automated systems

### Errors with Entity Positioning
- Pay attention to exact coordinates when placing interconnected entities
- Use the entity's drop_position property to determine correct placement of connected structures

### Errors with Entity Operation
- Monitor entity warnings to identify operational issues like "waiting for space in destination"
- Ensure proper fuel supply for all powered entities (burner inserters, mining drills, furnaces)
